languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

languages.text: Корабль летит по прямой и совершает U-образный разворот в конце движения, выбирая подходящую позицию в одном из трех направлений. Восстановление: случайное, (от 1 до 3) раундов. ! Можно использовать только во время {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}фазы Ускорения{/g}
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and choosing its position from three directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

languages.text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} fliegt in einer geraden Linie, führt am Ende seiner Bewegung eine vollständige Wende aus und kann seine finale Position aus 3 Richtungen auswählen. Abklingzeit: (1 bis 3) Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip. ! Kann nur während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} fliegt in einer geraden Linie, führt am Ende seiner Bewegung eine vollständige Wende aus und kann seine finale Position aus 3 Richtungen auswählen. <indent=5%>Abklingzeit: (von 1 bis 3) Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip. ! Kann nur während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} vole en ligne droite, effectue un demi-tour complet à la fin de son déplacement et peut choisir sa position finale parmi 3 directions. Temps de recharge : (de 1 à 3) rounds (aléatoire). ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} vole en ligne droite, effectue un demi-tour complet à la fin de son déplacement, et peut choisir sa position finale parmi 3 directions. <indent=5%>Délai de récupération : (de 1 à 3) rounds (aléatoire). ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} vuela en línea recta y gira bruscamente al terminar su movimiento, pudiendo elegir entre 3 direcciones para su posición final. Tiempo de recuperación: (de 1 a 3) asaltos, determinado al azar. ! Solo puede usarse durante la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} vuela en línea recta y gira bruscamente al terminar su movimiento, pudiendo elegir entre 3 direcciones para su posición final. <indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: (de 1 a 3) asaltos, determinado al azar. ! Solo puede usarse durante la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が一直線に飛行し、移動後にUターンして、3方向から最終位置を選ぶことができる。 クールダウン：ランダムで（1～3）ラウンド。 !{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}でしか使用できない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が一直線に飛行し、移動後にUターンして、3方向から最終位置を選ぶことができる。<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで（1～3）ラウンド。!{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}でしか使用できない。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}沿直线飞行，移动结束时，进行一次完整的转向，可以从三个方向中任意选择。 冷却时间：随机一到三轮。 ！此能力只能在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}使用。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement and can choose its final position from 3 directions. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}沿直线飞行，移动结束时，进行一次完整的转向，可以从三个方向中任意选择。 <indent=5%>冷却时间：随机一到三轮。！此能力只能在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}使用。
